title: Sugar Daddy/ Sugar Babies candy font
content:
Hi, I've been browsing for a while trying to find the name of the font used on the sugar daddy/ sugar babies candy but have had no luck. If someone can please let me know what font they think it is I'd be very thankful. Here's a link to a pic of the font [http://tootsie.com/img/sdSbLogo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822065505/http:/tootsie.com/img/sdSbLogo.gif "http://tootsie.com/img/sdSbLogo.gif") (I've also added it as an attachment).

Thanks again

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sdSbLogo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822065505/http:/typophile.com/files/sdSbLogo.gif) | 22.64 KB |
author: Malruxia

comments.content: Hmm... I looked around for as many modified fonts of Futura that I could find and none were really close. Thanks for the post though.

It's probably not a font. A lot of candy packaging has lettering that is drawn by hand. You might like [MVB Grenadine](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822065505/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mvb_fonts/mvb_grenadine_two/?sample_text=SUGAR%20DADDY&sample_size=36).
Ahh I see. Thanks for the help and for the font
